name: James Moulton
text: Never had a problem. They have great employees. If you come by before close you could get a free pizza.

name: Stephen Combs
text: Despite the fact that Icalled in my order the pizza was not what I had ordered. But I could clearly see that this location was Slammed.  However,  the very pleasant and courteous phone girl not only corrected the error but placed a credit ‚Ä¶More

text: If you are looking for Pizza Hut pizza in Summerville and you live 4.2 miles away, do not expect them to deliver to you.  I just called two locations (Dorchester road and Bacons Bridge rd), one 4.2 miles away and the other 4.3 miles away ‚Ä¶More

text: I‚Äôve ordered from this location 4 times.  3 of my 4 orders have arrived wrong.  On the previous 2 times, I called to receive an apology and a replacement for the wrong pizza I received instead of what I ordered. ‚Ä¶More

name: E B
text: I've used this pizza hut since FOREVER. they've never given me a problem. Tonight I ordered and it was over an hour late so I called the store simply asking for my money back. So the girl put me on hold then hung up on me. Tried to call back and still no answer. Definitely  lost this customer.

text: Ordered carryout because delivery was an hour. Went to pickup in 20 minutes...waited 40 and still got a cold pizza. 1st time trying this hut not overly impressed with the pie on this side of town!

name: Grady
text: Pretty good experience. The bare hands thing is a little gross. Also the cutter for the brownie hangs on the side of the cutting table and wasn't clean. I went to pick up carry out at 5:00 when I saw this. I doubt they had sold so many ‚Ä¶More

text: I am a recent employee of this Pizza Hut. The work environment was one of the most rewarding jobs I've ever had. The crew is a family and I'll miss all of them! Great management old and new!
